content: offering an instant pdf crochet pattern to make a quick and easy crochet steering wheel cover this little beauty is sure to have you smiling during your morning commute fits average car steering wheel approximate finished size of each square is 5 x 5 materials needed i love this cotton yarn crochet hook size 7 4 5mm tapestry needle pattern is written in english using standard american terms the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet with gabriella rose this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase
